message.body: Can you download line on your computer?
Uh...are you asking me if it's possible or asking me to do it?
Asking if it's possible. I think so because I have it on my computer but wasn't sure
I'm not sure, but I think it'd be possible.
Ok try. Do you have a conversation partner still?
I'm planning on doing language exchange with Juyeon on Saturdays. Other than that, nope.
Aww look at you. You're growing up. :') *sniff sniff*
Well that's good. I'm not sure but I might have another person for you. I'm her conversation partner but in the even I can't do it very often I thought y
ou could talk with her too. Another one of my friends asked me to help her out.
I'll need to make an account and stuff, but sure. When is she usually free?
Not sure. I just started talking with her today.
All right, let me know when you have more information then.
I'll update you when I get more info. I don't want to just throw her off on another person so soon. What kind of person would I be if I did that?
Whoa man, I didn't know that you just started talking with her today until now.
Yeah I did. My friends asked me to because she wanted a conversation partner.
